result.prevName: Kuwait Finance and Investment Company K.S.C. (Public)

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: KFIC Invest (K.S.C.P), together with its subsidiaries, provides consumer and commercial lending services to individuals and corporate entities in Kuwait. It operates through four segments: Finance, Asset Management, Investment and Corporate Finance, and Financial Brokerage and Online Trading. The company offers consumer and installment loans; corporate and real estate finance; and asset management services, such as property management, investment portfolio, and equity funds. It also provides online trading services for instruments, including equities, FX, and derivatives; and investment management, alternative investment, and consulting and advisory services. In addition, the company offers investment banking and brokerage services; leases, buys, and sells vehicles; manages funds and portfolios on behalf of its clients; and invests in securities and real estate. The company was formerly known as Kuwait Finance and Investment Company K.S.C and changed its name to KFIC Invest (K.S.C.P) in November 2022. (Public). KFIC Invest (K.S.C.P) was founded in 2000 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
